name: sneqbg
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wceq(csn(c0), csn(c2)), wceq(c0, c2)))

comment: Two singletons of sets are equal iff their elements are equal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)
